languages.text: {n}Идира встречает вас оживленным хором голосов, сквозь которые едва прорывается ее собственный.{/n} "Лорд-капитан! Никак не угомонятся голосочки мои, все вылезти из глотки желают, вас поприветствовать. Не иначе как чуят — вот он, порог последней дверки. Вашей дверки. Рискнете шагнуть за него? Я же ведь уже говорила, что за вами куда угодно последую? Или я это только потом скажу?"

{n}Idira greets you with a bustling chorus of voices, her own barely audible among them:{/n} "Lord Captain! You got my little voices all excited, they all want to crawl out of my throat to greet you. They can sense it, I bet. That it's the threshold of the final door. Your door. Will you risk stepping beyond it? Hey, have I already told you I'll follow you anywhere? Or does that one happen later?"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира встречает вас оживленным хором голосов, сквозь которые едва прорывается ее собственный.{/n} "Лорд-капитан! Никак не угомонятся голосочки мои, все вылезти из глотки желают, вас поприветствовать. Не иначе как чуят — вот он, порог последней дверки. Вашей дверки. Рискнете шагнуть за него? Я же ведь уже говорила, что за вами куда угодно последую? Или я это только потом скажу?"

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉发出了无数声音，齐声欢迎你，她自己的声音你几乎都听不清楚。{/n}“舰长大人！你让那些小小的声音兴奋不已，它们甚至都想从我的喉咙里爬出来，迎接你了。我敢说，它们肯定都感觉到了，那里就是最后的门槛，通往属于你大门。你愿意冒险迈过这扇门吗？嘿，我有没有告诉过你，无论你去哪里，我都愿意跟着？还是说，你打算过一阵子再去？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira greets you with a bustling chorus of voices, her own barely audible among them:{/n} "Lord Captain! You got my little voices all excited, they all want to crawl out of my throat to greet you. They can sense it, I bet. That it's the threshold of the final door. Your door. Will you risk stepping beyond it? Hey, have I already told you I'll follow you anywhere? Or does that one happen later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉发出了无数声音，齐声欢迎你，她自己的声音你几乎都听不清楚。{/n}“舰长大人！你让那些小小的声音兴奋不已，它们甚至都想从我的喉咙里爬出来，迎接你了。我敢说，它们肯定都感觉到了，那里就是最后的门槛，通往属于你大门。你愿意冒险迈过这扇门吗？嘿，我有没有告诉过你，无论你去哪里，我都愿意跟着？还是说，你打算过一阵子再去？”

languages.text: {n}Idira begrüßt dich mit einem regen Chor von Stimmen, in dem ihre eigene kaum zu hören ist:{/n} "Lord Captain! Meine kleinen Stimmen sind ganz aufgeregt, sie wollen alle aus meiner Kehle kriechen, um Euch zu begrüßen. Sie spüren es bestimmt. Dass wir an der Schwelle der letzten Tür stehen. Eurer Tür. Werdet Ihr es riskieren, sie zu überschreiten? Hey, habe ich Euch schon einmal gesagt, dass ich Euch überall hin folgen werde? Oder kommt das erst später?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira greets you with a bustling chorus of voices, her own barely audible among them:{/n} "Lord Captain! You got my little voices all excited, they all want to crawl out of my throat to greet you. They can sense it, I bet. That it's the threshold of the final door. Your door. Will you risk stepping beyond it? Hey, have I already told you I'll follow you anywhere? Or does that one happen later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira begrüßt dich mit einem regen Chor von Stimmen, in dem ihre eigene kaum zu hören ist:{/n} "Lord Captain! Meine kleinen Stimmen sind ganz aufgeregt, sie wollen alle aus meiner Kehle kriechen, um Euch zu begrüßen. Sie spüren es bestimmt. Dass wir an der Schwelle der letzten Tür stehen. Eurer Tür. Werdet Ihr es riskieren, sie zu überschreiten? Hey, habe ich Euch schon einmal gesagt, dass ich Euch überall hin folgen werde? Oder kommt das erst später?"

languages.text: {n}Un chœur assourdissant de voix vous accueille en même temps qu'Idira, que vous parvenez à peine à entendre dans cette cacophonie :{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Mes petites voix sont tellement excitées qu'elles veulent s'extirper de ma gorge pour vous saluer. Je suis sûre qu'elles sentent que c'est le seuil de la dernière porte. Votre porte. Prendrez-vous le risque de la franchir ? À ce propos, est-ce que je vous ai déjà dit que je vous suivrai partout ? Ou ce n'est pas encore arrivé ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira greets you with a bustling chorus of voices, her own barely audible among them:{/n} "Lord Captain! You got my little voices all excited, they all want to crawl out of my throat to greet you. They can sense it, I bet. That it's the threshold of the final door. Your door. Will you risk stepping beyond it? Hey, have I already told you I'll follow you anywhere? Or does that one happen later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un chœur assourdissant de voix vous accueille en même temps qu'Idira, que vous parvenez à peine à entendre dans cette cacophonie :{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Mes petites voix sont tellement excitées qu'elles veulent s'extirper de ma gorge pour vous saluer. Je suis sûre qu'elles sentent que c'est le seuil de la dernière porte. Votre porte. Prendrez-vous le risque de la franchir ? À ce propos, est-ce que je vous ai déjà dit que je vous suivrai partout ? Ou ce n'est pas encore arrivé ? »

languages.text: {n}Idira te saluda con un bullicioso coro de voces entre las que apenas distingues la suya:{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! Tiene muy emocionadas a mis vocecitas, quieren salir todas a saludarle. Seguro que pueden sentirlo. Es el umbral de la última puerta. Su puerta. ¿Se atreverá a atravesarla? Por cierto, ¿le he dicho ya que le seguiré a donde sea, o eso pasa en el futuro?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira greets you with a bustling chorus of voices, her own barely audible among them:{/n} "Lord Captain! You got my little voices all excited, they all want to crawl out of my throat to greet you. They can sense it, I bet. That it's the threshold of the final door. Your door. Will you risk stepping beyond it? Hey, have I already told you I'll follow you anywhere? Or does that one happen later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira te saluda con un bullicioso coro de voces entre las que apenas distingues la suya:{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! Tiene muy emocionadas a mis vocecitas, quieren salir todas a saludarle. Seguro que pueden sentirlo. Es el umbral de la última puerta. Su puerta. ¿Se atreverá a atravesarla? Por cierto, ¿le he dicho ya que le seguiré a donde sea, o eso pasa en el futuro?».

languages.text: {n}イディラは賑やかな声の合唱で出迎えてくれるが、彼女自身の声はほとんど聞こえない。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン！あたいの小さな声たちが興奮して、喉から飛び出したがっているの。感じるのよ、あれが最後の扉の入り口だって。あなたの扉よ。あの先に足を踏み入れる覚悟はできてる？ねえ、あなたにならどこへでもついて行くって言ったかしら？それとも後で言った方がいい？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira greets you with a bustling chorus of voices, her own barely audible among them:{/n} "Lord Captain! You got my little voices all excited, they all want to crawl out of my throat to greet you. They can sense it, I bet. That it's the threshold of the final door. Your door. Will you risk stepping beyond it? Hey, have I already told you I'll follow you anywhere? Or does that one happen later?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは賑やかな声の合唱で出迎えてくれるが、彼女自身の声はほとんど聞こえない。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン！あたいの小さな声たちが興奮して、喉から飛び出したがっているの。感じるのよ、あれが最後の扉の入り口だって。あなたの扉よ。あの先に足を踏み入れる覚悟はできてる？ねえ、あなたにならどこへでもついて行くって言ったかしら？それとも後で言った方がいい？」

languages.text: {n}İdira seni gürültülü bir sesler korosuyla karşılıyor. Kendi sesi, diğerlerinin arasından zar zor seçiliyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Küçük seslerime heyecan yaptırdın, hepsi de boğazımdan çıkıp seni selamlamak istiyor. Bahse girerim son kapının, senin kapının eşiğinde olduğumuzu onlar da hissediyor. Kapıdan geçme riskine girecek misin? Nereye olursa olsun seni takip edeceğimi daha önce söylemiş miydim? Yoksa daha sonra mı söylemem gerekiyordu?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira greets you with a bustling chorus of voices, her own barely audible among them:{/n} "Lord Captain! You got my little voices all excited, they all want to crawl out of my throat to greet you. They can sense it, I bet. That it's the threshold of the final door. Your door. Will you risk stepping beyond it? Hey, have I already told you I'll follow you anywhere? Or does that one happen later?"
